name: The Spread
description:
Backstory: 

The world is being overrun by some kind of zombie horde and its slowly eating its way through everything! Luckily for us they seem to be very stupid and are following the path of least resistance, flowing through the valleys like water. Once the valleys are full though, they’ll come for us!

Win Conditions: 

Fight the horde back to the edges of the map and finish them off

Lose Conditions: 

You lose if your HQ is destroyed.

Hints:

  • Buildings with people inside cannot be destroyed. Your people will continuously repair the building until they are dead. You can sacrifice some of your population this way, slowing down the horde in the lower regions to buy more time up top.
  • The HQ replenishes metal slowly over time.
  • Buildings require people to operate them. If there are no people within, they are useless!
  • to get more people, cannot your HQ to a city
  • cities can only replenish people if they have a food supply.
  • all military nodes require metal to shoot bullets.
